ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Bye everyone!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks! You ll be missed. Have fun with whatever you re moving on to! And hello everybody. No, don t back away. I won t eat you. What? What clever? Oh
ygData.messageBody:
> Hi!
> As a result of me quitting EQ I have handed over the ownership of this
> mailing list to Su, she seems like a reasonable person to carry on, even
> tho there isn't really much this list has required in the ways of
> maintenance.. I have barely done jack here since I started it back
> during beta.. :p However i did restrict access to the calendar now and
> removed that annoying spam event thing hehe...
> Good luck everyone!
> - Dunbar / Avron
>
Thanks! You'll be missed. Have fun with whatever you're moving on to!
And hello everybody. No, don't back away. I won't eat you. What? What
clever? Oh that, it's just... uhh.. it's rubber. Not real. heh. Why is
everyone running? Come back! Come back!!
heh.
Anyways, on with the show.
luv,
-Su
